summary: "Ellie - A Racemenu Preset" is ,like the title says, a preset for Racemenu.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Arial][color=#3c78d8][size=6][font=Courier New]Ellie - A Racemenu Preset
[/font][/size][/color][/font]
[size=3][/size]
[/center][size=3][color=#ff0000] [size=4]UPDATE (21/08/2018): Working on a standalone follower and an ECE preset ! (might take some time because I am still learning)[/size]
[/color]First thing first, I am a noob in English. So, please excuse my horrible syntaxe, mispronounciation, etc.

Ellie is a Racemenu Preset that I have created a long time ago. I have always wanted to share with the Community in the case if someone is somhow intesrested in.
Ellie is reheaded and tattoed Nordic young woman. She is in constant work, so I will most probably update her very often to get her more and more beautiful, update per update.
[/size]
[color=#ff0000][size=4]WARNING[/size]: [color=#ffffff][size=3]I am not really a modder so if there is any bug because of my Preset, unfortunately I can't help a lot. Your best way to get help will be the Post Section of this Mod page.[/size][/color]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/28TB1NT][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1815/43247162855_45da9a9505_h.jpg[/img][/url]

[/color][center][color=#ff0000]﻿[size=5]Requirement And Credits[/size][/color][/center]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]Racemenu[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481]Expired[/url]
[size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] by [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4557236]HHaleyy[/url] to get the same texture as the picture shows
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665]Kalilies[/url] for the hair
﻿[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327]SG Femal Eyebrows[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2209393]hellosanta[/url] for the eyebrows
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/308756]LogRaam[/url] for the eyes
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86208]Freckle Mania 2[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/981329]tetrodoxin[/url]﻿ for the freckles
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49979?tab=description]Rutah Tattoo Pack[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/9298683]Rutah[/url] for the tattoo
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90360?tab=description]Real Body - UUNP BodySlide Preset[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/29658810]wnisewond[/url] [color=#ff0000](Not a requirement but you will need it if you want to have the same body as the picture shows)

[url=https://flic.kr/p/N9iJp7][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1858/30286402828_f76e957d13_h.jpg[/img][/url]
[center]﻿[/center][center][size=5]﻿Installation
[/size][/center][/color][list=1]
[*][size=3]Download the file and unzip it with your favorite software (7Zip, WinRar, etc.)[/size]
[*][size=3]Put the Preset folder in your CharGen folder (Skyrim>Data>SKSE>Plugins>Chargen)[/size]
[*][size=3]Go into your game. Type the "Tilda" (~) button on your keyboard, and then type "showracemenu"[/size]
[*][size=3]Go to ''Preset" and then type "F9" then chose to import the file with the name ''EllieV(X).jslot"[/size]
[*][size=3]All set Capt'n ![/size]

[/list][color=#ff0000]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/N9iJ7U][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1870/30286401888_cc53daae9d_h.jpg[/img][/url]
[/color][center][color=#ff0000][size=5]F.A.Q.
[/size][/color][/center][list=1]
[*][size=3]-The preset that I have loaded does not look like the pictures you have showed me.                                                                                  -Check if you have all the requirement. If you still got the issue post a screenshoot in the picture section and I will try to remedy at the problem.[/size]
[*][size=3]-Do I have your permession to modify her ?                                                                                                                                                                  -Yep, you can modify her if it's for personal use.[/size]
[*][size=3]-Can I put her in my mod ?                                                                                                                                                                                            -Yep, you can but you need to notify me first.[/size]
[*][size=3]-So you can't speak English, you can't mod and your mod description is really bad. Why should I download your preset ?                              -Because Ellie might enlight your Skyrim Life, my Fellow Skyrim Player.[/size]
[*][size=3]-I don't like the preset.                                                                                                                                                                                                      -I don't like Monday's.[/size]
[/list][size=4][color=#ff0000]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/LvFAZx][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1868/29215603257_871cd3769b_h.jpg[/img][/url]

I will be very happy to see your sreenshots of her in the Picture Section. So go ahead, don't be shy !

P.S. : [color=#ffffff]If I have forgot to put any credits in the description or broke any permission, PM me and I will correct ASAP.[/color][/color][/size]
author: Bappi20020
